doc:
Billy Gardell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Gardell 0 William Gardell (born August 20, 1969) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, game show host and voice artist. Gardell played Chicago police officer Mike Biggs on Mike Molly. He also made an appearance in a dozen episodes of My Name Is Earl as a police officer. Gardell voiced Santa in Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas, as well as starring on Sullivan Son in the recurring role of Lyle Winkler. William_Gardell ( born August_20_,_1969 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , game_show_host_and_voice_artist . Gardell played Chicago_police_officer_Mike_Biggs on Mike_ . He also made an_appearance in a_dozen_episodes of My_Name Is Earl as a_police_officer . Gardell voiced Santa in Ice_Age : A_Mammoth_Christmas , as_well_as starring on Sullivan_ in the_recurring_role of Lyle_Winkler .
